page.title: 14Religion
page.content: The present church was built in 1778,and lies at the east end of Forteviot village and is a church of Scotland. Between 30 and 40 people attend. The number is not constant. The present minister has another church to attend to at Aberdalgie which is north east of Forteviot. He lives in Aberdalgie manse. He came here less than a year ago from Leith, Edinburgh. There have been 40 ministers here over the years. Forteviot church contains valuable items-a Celtic handbell and communion silver.The church is kept locked for this reason outside of Sunday services etc.
